name: axe-applitools
description: Exploring the AI Driven Applitools Visual Regression Testing in Drupal Site

scripts.visual: as-a applitools npx cypress run --env grepTags=@Visual --headless --browser chrome
scripts.json:api: as-a applitools npx cypress run --env grepTags=@JSON:API --headless --browser chrome
scripts.test: as-a applitools npx cypress run --headless --browser chrome
